text: Canteleux is a former commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new Bonnières.Arrêté préfectoral 25 September 2018, modified 26 October 2018 Before, it was the least populous commune in the department. ==Geography== It is located 23 miles (37 km) west of Arras on the D84E1, which forms part of the border with the Somme department. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Former communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Canteleux
